name: The Fools Anecdote
description:
A 2D Platformer where you are the one and only fool, you must save the world from the evils threatening it and use the power of cards to save it!

This is a game for the 2nd Vaultacular Game Jam hosted by WhiteVault, with a limitation of three items and the theme is Strange Influence.

Controls: 

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys. (Up and down for ladders and swimming)

Jump: Space

Abilities:

Fool Card: Hides from enemies

Magician Card: Turns "most" enemies into a card. They will no longer harm the player

Tower Card: Can turn enemies into blocks the player can stand, bounce or climb

High Priest: Reverts the enemy to it's original form.

Temperance: (While in the air Press space) -> Gives the player the ability to slowfall.

Hanged Man: Checkpoints

Game Design, Programming, Art: Zemeck
Music: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/jrpg-music-pack/
